front.title: A mechanism for synchronization across name servers on zone creation

abstract.t: This memo describes the NEWZONE_NOTIFY opcode for DNS, by which a primary master server advises a set of slave servers that there are zones that has been created and that queries should be initiated to discover the new zone data. This draft also specifies a mechanism for the slave servers to achieve authenticated synchronization of zone data as well as zone synchronization information with the primary when zones are created on the primary.
